title: Showboating MMA fighter gets brutally KO'd

But then I keep seeing videos and every time I'd tell people to never celebrate too early, yet they justâ€¦ The exciting finish of the #ajcprr ! Which brings us back to this showboating MMA fighter, who got everything he deserved for attempting an Ali Shuffle right here. The fighter was an Englishman called Joe Harding, and the KO came against his featherweight title fight against Johan Segas over the weekend. FAIL: MMA fighter attempts a mid-fight dance....and then this happens. ðŸ˜‚ðŸ’¥ pic.twitter.com/yd029Myljg Read or Share this story: http://ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/showboating-mma-fighter-gets-brutally-knocked-out-exactly-one-second-later/ Most Popular
